Name: Jack Dempsey
Ingredients: 45 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: Dilution makes or breaks this subtle, gin-laced Daiquiri variation.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Stanley M. Jones' 1977 Jones' Complete Barguide ., this cocktail celebrates Jack Dempsey, world heavyweight boxing champion from 1919 to 1926.
Nutrition: One serving of Jack Dempsey contains 162 calories
